name: Bouncy Brad
description:
Bouncy brad is a sports themed hardcore platform.  You play as a Brad,  a football trying to save his brother Pat.  A simple game made by one guy for BYOG 2018. Hope you enjoy it :)

Controls: 

Arrow keys to move
Space bar to float

Press R to Reset in case you get stuck.

How to play:

Its a ZIP FILE. Just unzip it and play the exe in the folder.
